title: TILL THE CLOUDS ROLL BY Film 1946 USA

sources.title: TILL THE CLOUDS ROLL BY Film 1946 USA
sources.description: The life and times of the composer Jerome Kern. Songs include - "Make Believe" ; "They Didn't Believe Me" ; "Smoke Gets In Your Eyes" ; "Till The Clouds Roll By" ;"OL' MAN RIVER" - STARRING - ROBERT WALKER as Jerome Kern - with JUDY GARLAND, VAN HEFLIN, LENA HORNE, MARY NASH, VAN JOHNSON, DIANA SHORE, FRANK SINATRA.
